modName: mlrose's Enhanced Lakeview Manor - Common Optional Files
summary: Optional files used by the Enhanced Lakeview Manor mods. Mainly merged navmeshes. Read full description.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][img]http://i.imgur.com/nPRvdmz.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=4]Enhanced Lakeview Manor is a mod series. The mainly goal is improve the interior of the manor, making it beautiful, cozy, useful, organized and Dovahkiin worthy. This page will contain some common optional files, such as navmesh alterations from the released mods merged into one file. Maybe some other alterations, but mainly this. Check the released mods so far:[/size][/font]

[center][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59565/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/DrIPqqz.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64927/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/dpWcVNq.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80407/?][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80407-0-1479838274.png[/img][/url]

[/font][/center][size=4][b]Requirements
[/b][/size][size=3]Skyrim 1.9.32* or higher;
Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn DLCs.
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]ELM mods. See description of each file to know which file needs which ELM mod.[/b][/size][/font]

[size=4][b]Installation[/b][/size]
[size=3][i]*Always make back-up saves before trying new mods.*[/i]

Make sure you are outside the Lakeview manor before installing.
Download the files and install on NMM or download the zip manually, extract and copy the files to your Skyrim's data folder.
Just put the optional files after the ELM main files.[/size]

[size=4][b]Compatibility[/b]
[/size][size=3]Check each file description. If there's some incompatibility I'll let you know.[/size]

[size=4][b]Uninstall[/b]
[/size][size=3]Before uninstall, remove any items from the room that you want to keep, leave the manor and make a hard save. Then you can uninstall the mod in NMM or delete the files from your data folder. Load your save and save again. Done.[/size]
author: mlrose
